resources.string: First select a contact with whom you would like to share your location in case of emergency.

SecureTravel lets you easily share your location during potentially dangerous circumstances. 

You are required to select one of your contacts as the contact to whom the distress message is to be sent. You can change this contact at any time. 

To send a distress message, click on 'Send location as SMS' button and choose one of the two modes - Single SMS mode or Continuous Location Update. In Continuous Location Update mode, an SMS with your latest location will be sent every minute until you choose to stop. 

Once location is received by SecureTravel, the map is set. It is recommended to send the location after the map is set, as your location will be included as a Google Maps link in the SMS. If location could not be determined, only a distress message is sent, without the link. 

If your chosen contact has SecureTravel installed in their device, a distress alarm is played upon receiving a distress message. This applies even for the SMS without location data. 

For correspondence, write to sulyabtv@gmail.com
